name: PortableCameraAdditions
author: NotAKidoS
description:
Adds a few basic settings to the Portable Camera.

Expert settings for Near Clip & Far Clip.
Expert settings for Orthographic & Orthographic Size.
By default, Near Clip & Far Clip are copied on world load.
F11 to fullscreen on Desktop.
changelog: Added F11 bind to fullscreen Portable Camera on Desktop.
